languages.text: "Угрозы — удел слабых. Я же желаю тебя удержать от ошибки, как верный соратник. Мерзости, которым попустительствуешь ты, вот-вот перейдут черту, за которой обретается непростительность. И не желаю я видеть, как ты это черту перешагиваешь, ибо на всех нас лежит долг, и мой долг — сие карать".

"Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."
languages.original_text: "Угрозы — удел слабых. Я же желаю тебя удержать от ошибки, как верный соратник. Мерзости, которым попустительствуешь ты, вот-вот перейдут черту, за которой обретается непростительность. И не желаю я видеть, как ты это черту перешагиваешь, ибо на всех нас лежит долг, и мой долг — сие карать".

traits.locale_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am being a loyal ally who is trying to keep you from making a mistake. The abominable things you connive at are about to cross the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. And I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and mine is to punish exactly this."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Las amenazas son el recurso de los débiles. Yo soy un aliado fiel que pretende evitar que cometa un error. La vileza que parece aprobar le sitúa al borde de una línea más allá de la cual no cabe perdón alguno. No deseo verle cruzar esa línea, pues todos tenemos un deber que cumplir, y el mío consiste en castigar tales transgresiones».
languages.original_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."

traits.locale_text: «Las amenazas son el recurso de los débiles. Yo soy un aliado fiel que pretende evitar que cometa un error. La vileza que parece aprobar le sitúa al borde de una línea más allá de la cual no cabe perdón alguno. No deseo verle cruzar esa línea, pues todos tenemos un deber que cumplir, y el mío consiste en castigar tales transgresiones».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “威胁是弱者的手段。我只不过是你的忠实盟友，想要阻止你犯错而已。你对邪恶的纵容，已经快要越过底线了。一旦越过了这条底线，就再也没有宽恕可言了。我不希望看到你越界，因为我们有各自的职责，而我的职责就是惩罚越界者。”
languages.original_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."

traits.locale_text: “威胁是弱者的手段。我只不过是你的忠实盟友，想要阻止你犯错而已。你对邪恶的纵容，已经快要越过底线了。一旦越过了这条底线，就再也没有宽恕可言了。我不希望看到你越界，因为我们有各自的职责，而我的职责就是惩罚越界者。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Les menaces sont le recours des faibles. Je suis un allié fidèle qui tente de vous empêcher de commettre une erreur. L'infamie que vous cautionnez est à deux doigts de dépasser des limites au-delà desquelles tout pardon est impossible. Je ne souhaite pas vous voir aller trop loin, car nous sommes tous tenus par notre devoir, et sachez que le mien consiste à punir ce genre de transgressions. »
languages.original_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."

traits.locale_text: « Les menaces sont le recours des faibles. Je suis un allié fidèle qui tente de vous empêcher de commettre une erreur. L'infamie que vous cautionnez est à deux doigts de dépasser des limites au-delà desquelles tout pardon est impossible. Je ne souhaite pas vous voir aller trop loin, car nous sommes tous tenus par notre devoir, et sachez que le mien consiste à punir ce genre de transgressions. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「脅しは弱者の手段だ。俺は忠実な同盟者であり、お前の過ちを防ごうとしているだけさ。お前が容認する悪逆は、許しがたい一線を越えようとしている。俺はお前がその一線を越えるのを見たくはない。俺たちは皆、責務に縛られている。そして、そのような違反を罰するのが俺の責務だからだ」
languages.original_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."

traits.locale_text: 「脅しは弱者の手段だ。俺は忠実な同盟者であり、お前の過ちを防ごうとしているだけさ。お前が容認する悪逆は、許しがたい一線を越えようとしている。俺はお前がその一線を越えるのを見たくはない。俺たちは皆、責務に縛られている。そして、そのような違反を罰するのが俺の責務だからだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Drohungen sind das Mittel der Schwachen. Ich bin ein treuer Verbündeter, der versucht, Euch vor einem Fehler zu bewahren. Die Schurkerei, die Ihr gutheißt, kommt einer Überquerung der Grenzen sehr nahe, für die es keine Vergebung gibt. Ich möchte nicht, dass Ihr diese Grenzen überschreitet, denn wir alle sind an unsere Pflicht gebunden ... und meine Pflicht ist es, solche Vergehen zu bestrafen."
languages.original_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "Drohungen sind das Mittel der Schwachen. Ich bin ein treuer Verbündeter, der versucht, Euch vor einem Fehler zu bewahren. Die Schurkerei, die Ihr gutheißt, kommt einer Überquerung der Grenzen sehr nahe, für die es keine Vergebung gibt. Ich möchte nicht, dass Ihr diese Grenzen überschreitet, denn wir alle sind an unsere Pflicht gebunden ... und meine Pflicht ist es, solche Vergehen zu bestrafen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Tehdit etmek, zayıfların işidir. Ben seni hata yapmaktan alıkoymaya çalışan, sadık bir dostunum. Göz yumduğun kötülükler, ardında kefaret olmayan bir sınırı aşmaya epey yaklaştı. O sınırı geçtiğini görmek istemem. Zira hepimiz, vazifelerimizle birbirimize bağlıyız. Benim vazifem de böylesi suçların cezasını vermektir."
languages.original_text: "Threats are the recourse of the weak. I am a loyal ally trying to keep you from making a mistake. The villainy you condone comes close to crossing the line beyond which there is no forgiveness. I do not wish to see you cross that line, for we are all bound by our duties, and it is my duty to punish such transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "Tehdit, zayıfların yöntemidir. Ben seni hata yapmaktan alıkoymaya çalışan, sadık bir dostunum. Göz yumduğun kötülükler, ardında kefaret olmayan bir sınırı aşmaya çok yakın. O sınırı aştığını görmek istemem. Zira hepimiz görevlerimizle birbirimize bağlıyız ve benim görevim, bu suçları cezalandırmak."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
